title: Who Speaks for the Lazy? -  Beckett quotation

content.prompt: Which statement best describes the significance of the Beckett quotation in Paragraph 5 (There is ... to express")?

choices.label: The best writers are their own harshest critics.
One is born with the ability to write creatively; the skill cannot be taught.
Writing is an ambition that few attempt to realize.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
